text: The Costa Rican Football Federation (; FCRF), also known as FEDEFUTBOL, is the governing body of football in Costa Rica. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1921. It became a member of FIFA in 1927 and CONCACAF in 1962. title: Costa Rican Football Federation
